desc: Register and manage the coupons issued from both online or offline.

addCouponCode.title: Register new coupons
addCouponCode.label: Enter coupon codes
cautionContent: We do not include 0 or 1 numbers in coupon codes. Please be careful not to be confused with the letters O and I.
Since products given as coupons are applied in duplicate with existing products

couponList.title: List of registered coupons
couponList.desc: Click on the item to see the coupon menu

message.registerNotExist: The coupon with the number you entered does not exist.
message.registerExpired: Cannot register this coupon since the validity date has expired
message.useAlready: This coupon has already been used
message.useExpired: Cannot use this coupon since the validity date has expired

useModal.title: Coupon screen
useModal.desc: Would you like to use the coupon? Coupon will be applied immediately when used and cannot be canceled.
